A not for profit organisation providing supported living projects for people with learning disabilities at various locations around the city. Offers outreach support in the community eg attending work placements and social activities out and about in the community. This company is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
Offers advice and support to people who receive direct payments. Helps individuals to manage their care budget. Will also recruit a personal assistant and employ a personal assistant.
